rules_text: Until end of turn, target attacking creature you control can't be blocked except by target untapped creature defending player controls.
flavor_text: [i]To prove their numbers, the monsters lined up across the sea so that the hare could hop across their backs and count them one by one. The hare could not resist boasting of its deception before crossing the last one.[/i]
notes:
!exportname The White Rabbits Trick
!tag Tewi
!tag Tei
